directions: Place 2 teaspoons of Red Gold Petite Diced Tomatoes with Garlic & Olive Oil on each cracker or baguette slice.
Sprinkle with 1 teaspoon cheese and 1/2 teaspoon of basil.  Place on serving tray.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can RED GOLD® Petite Diced Tomatoes with Garlic & Olive Oil, well drained
1 (9 ounce) box rosemary and olive oil wheat crackers, or baguette slices
title: Easy Bruschetta from RED GOLD®
